summary: Namaz Öğretici tab UI was rewritten to a single scrollable, text-only list with Men/Women toggle, and the content model was refactored to remove imagePath. However, the diff also adds a new "Günlük Namaz Rekatları" (rakat counts) section which was not requested. Due to truncation, it’s not fully verifiable that women steps remain complete/stable or that no runtime references to the old namaz image assets remain anywhere in the screen/content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all tutorial images from the Namaz Öğretici experience and remove any runtime dependency on tutorial image asset paths (e.g., /assets/generated/namaz-*.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The updated tab renders no tags in the shown code, but the diff is truncated and does not conclusively show that no tutorial image asset paths are referenced at runtime anywhere in the Namaz Öğretici screen/content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure both menNamazSteps and womenNamazSteps remain complete, ordered, and stable via their existing step ids.
missing_requirements.reason: menNamazSteps are visible with stable ids, but womenNamazSteps content is truncated in the diff summary, so completeness/order/stability for the women flow cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new "Günlük Namaz Rekatları" rakat-counts section (prayerRakatCounts) above the tutorial content.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to convert Namaz Öğretici to text-only single-page men/women flows and remove swipe/images; it did not request adding new rakat count content/section.
